GetMemberRankHistoryList.Statement: SELECT w2_UserMemberRankHistory.*, BeforeRank.member_rank_name AS before_rank_name, AfterRank.member_rank_name AS after_rank_name FROM w2_UserMemberRankHistory -- 更新前ランク名取得用(ランクが存在しない場合を考慮) LEFT JOIN w2_MemberRank AS BeforeRank ON ( w2_UserMemberRankHistory.before_rank_id = BeforeRank.member_rank_id ) -- 更新後ランク名取得用(ランクが存在しない場合を考慮) LEFT OUTER JOIN w2_MemberRank AS AfterRank ON ( w2_UserMemberRankHistory.after_rank_id = AfterRank.member_rank_id ) WHERE w2_UserMemberRankHistory.user_id = @user_id ORDER BY w2_UserMemberRankHistory.date_created DESC
